data.message: Please focus instead on reducing the amount of plastic from your bottles entering the oceans, and causing havoc and untold damage to centuries to come.  Thank you

replies.message: Hi Eleanor, thanks for getting in touch. We know sustainability, and recycling specifically, is a vital issue to address and that’s why we’re currently in the process of reviewing our sustainable packaging strategy which we’ll publish later in the year.  Deposit return schemes are also a big part of these discussions as more people are looking for ways to increase recycling rates and conversations are already underway in Scotland. For more info please visit: www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
